## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix/feature works
- [ ] New and existing tests pass locally

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md (if applicable)
- [ ] I have added/updated code comments
- [ ] I have updated README.md (if applicable)

### Dependencies
- [ ] I have checked that my changes don't introduce new dependencies
- [ ] OR I have justified new dependencies in this PR description
- [ ] All dependencies are properly licensed (compatible with project license)

## For Maintainers

### Review Checklist
- [ ] Code reviewed
- [ ] Tests reviewed
- [ ] Documentation reviewed
- [ ] CI/CD passed
- [ ] Approved by maintainer

### Merge Strategy
- [ ] Squash and merge
- [ ] Rebase and merge
- [ ] Create merge commit
